item.title: ‘Dragon Age: The Veilguard’ at San Diego Comic-Con - Temple of Geek
item.description:
1. ‘Dragon Age: The Veilguard’ at San Diego Comic-Con  Temple of Geek
  2. BioWare On Returning To The Dragon Age Series, 10 Years After Inquisition  Game Informer
  3. According to BioWare, Dragon Age: The Veilguard is the first entry in the series where 'the combat's actually fun' and where characters are 'intentionally' the focus of the storytelling, which seems pretty unfair on the first three games  PC Gamer
  4. Even after the Baldur's Gate RPGs, BioWare vet says Dragon Age: The Veilguard was when the dev "finally said out loud" it's best at "telling stories through characters"  Gamesradar
  5. BioWare will be at SDCC with a brand-new look at Dragon Age 4 next week  TechRadar
